title: About refounds
body: When the season 7 will start are we going to get 3 refounds back ? I really want to buy lee sin and  Kha zix is not what i expected so i would like to refound him .

replies.body:
I'm not aware of any plans to provide more refunds as a part of the new ranked season. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Tbh.. I don't think they will give every single player their 3 refunds back... If they would why wouldn't we get 3 refunds at the beginning of season 6? This is my hypothesis, you can ask in a ticket about this, but it's also good to put this on the boards, I hope any riot support will see this and answer!

Best wishes, A Kat Main {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
